name: Við spilum endalaust
wikiSummary:
"Við spilum endalaust" (Icelandic for "We Play Endlessly") is the fourth track on Sigur Rós' album, Með suð í eyrum við spilum endalaust and it will be released as the third single.
 A 35mn documentary/film poem called "Við spilum endalaust" (shot in Iceland, England, Mexico and America) is also present in the DVD of Með suð í eyrum við spilum endalaust Deluxe edition.
wikiText:
"Við spilum endalaust" (Icelandic for "We Play Endlessly") is the fourth track on Sigur Rós' album, Með suð í eyrum við spilum endalaust and it will be released as the third single.
 A 35mn documentary/film poem called "Við spilum endalaust" (shot in Iceland, England, Mexico and America) is also present in the DVD of Með suð í eyrum við spilum endalaust Deluxe edition.
